IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: TO PROVIDE SUPPORTIVE SERVICES FOR VICTIMS AND ELIMINATE DOMESTIC AND SEXUAL VIOLENCE IN BERKS COUNTY.
IRS990.MissionDescription: TO PROVIDE SUPPORTIVE SERVICES FOR VICTIMS AND ELIMINATE DOMESTIC AND SEXUAL VIOLENCE IN BERKS COUNTY.
IRS990.Description: PROVIDE SAFE EMERGENCY SHELTER FOR UP TO 30 DAYS WITHIN ANY SIX MONTH PERIOD FOR VICTIMS OF DOMESTIC VIOLENCE AND THEIR CHILDREN. WHILE LIVING IN SHELTER, WOMEN AND CHILDREN HAVE THE OPTION OF RECEIVING SUPPORTIVE COUNSELING, ADVOCACY AND REFERRAL, AS WELL AS EDUCATION ABOUT VARIOUS OPTIONS AND ASSISTANCE DURING AND AFTER SHELTER IN AN EFFORT TO ENHANCE SAFETY AND QUALITY OF LIFE.

Activity2.Description: THE COUNSELING DEPARTMENT PROVIDES SUPPORT TO VICTIMS OF DOMESTIC AND SEXUAL VIOLENCE AND THEIR FAMILIES IN UNDERSTANDING THE DYNAMICS AND EFFECTS OF ABUSE.

Activity3.Description: THE LEGAL DEPARTMENT IS COMMITTED TO PROVIDING QUALITY LEGAL SERVICES AND ADVOCACY TO VICTIMS OF DOMESTIC AND SEXUAL ASSAULT. BERKS WOMEN IN CRISIS ATTORNEYS REPRESENT VICTIMS ON PROTECTION FROM ABUSE (PFA) ACTIONS. LEGAL ADVOCATES PROVIDE ACCOMPANIMENT TO PERSONS SEEKING EMERGENCY OR TEMPORARY PFA'S AS WELL AS TO CRIMINAL COURT HEARINGS AND POLICE INTERVIEWS.

ActivityOther.Description: TRANSITIONAL HOUSING, DAYCARE SERVICES, & PREVENTION EDUCATION.

IRS990ScheduleA.GeneralExplanation: Schedule A, Part II, Line 10, Explanation of Other Income: miscellaneous loan forgiveness

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Description of Uncertain Tax Positions Under FIN 48:
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: LINE 2: WHEN TAX RETURNS ARE FILED, IT IS HIGHLY CERTAIN THAT SOME POSITIONS TAKEN WOULD BE SUSTAINED UPON EXAMINATION BY THE TAXING AUTHORITIES, WHILE OTHERS ARE SUBJECT TO UNCERTAINTY ABOUT THE MERITS OF THE POSITION TAKEN OR THE AMOUNT OF THE POSITION THAT WOULD ULTIMATELY BE SUSTAINED. THE BENEFIT OF A TAX POSITION IS RECOGNIZED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS IN THE PERIOD DURING WHICH, BASED ON ALL AVAILABLE EVIDENCE, MANAGEMENT BELIEVES IT IS MORE LIKELY THAN NOT THAT THE POSITION WILL BE SUSTAINED UPON EXAMINATION, INCLUDING THE RESOLUTION OF APPEALS OR LITIGATION PROCESSES, IF ANY. TAX POSITIONS TAKEN ARE NOT OFFSET OR AGGREGATED WITH OTHER POSITIONS. TAX POSITIONS THAT MEET THE MORE-LIKELY-THAN-NOT RECOGNITION THRESHOLD ARE MEASURED AS THE LARGEST AMOUNT OF TAX BENEFIT THAT IS MORE THAN 50% LIKELY OF BEING REALIZED UPON SETTLEMENT WITH THE APPLICABLE TAXING AUTHORITY. THE PORTION OF THE BENEFITS ASSOCIATED WITH TAX POSITIONS TAKEN THAT EXCEEDS THE AMOUNT MEASURED AS DESCRIBED ABOVE IS REFLECTED AS A LIABILITY FOR UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS IN THE ACCOMPANYING STATEMENTS OF FINANCIAL POSITION ALONG WITH ANY ASSOCIATED INTEREST AND PENALTIES THAT WOULD BE PAYABLE TO THE TAXING AUTHORITIES UPON EXAMINATION.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 7a
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE NOMINATING COMMITTEE IS RESPONSIBLE FOR RECRUITING, SCREENING, AND PROPOSING NOMINATIONS TO FILL VACANCIES ON THE BOARD. NEW MEMBERS ARE ELECTED AT THE ANNUAL MEETING HELD IN JUNE.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 7b
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS SHALL EXERCISE THE RIGHTS, POWERS AND PRIVILEGES OF DIRECTORS OF A CORPORATION ORGANIZED UNDER LAW. THE BOARD SHALL SPECIFICALLY BE RESPONSIBLE FOR OVERSEEING THE AFFAIRS AND HIRING EMPLOYEES OF THE CORPORATION, APPROVING THE MISSION AND THE STRATEGIC DIRECTION OF THE CORPORATION (UTILIZING STAFF RECOMMENDATIONS WHEN APPROPRIATE), ELECTING THE OFFICERS AND DIRECTORS OF THE CORPORATION, AND OTHERWISE OVERSEEING THE ACTIVITIES OF THE CORPORATION.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND THE PRESIDENT OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS PRIOR TO FILING.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: EMPLOYEES AND OFFICERS SIGN DISCLOSURE AT TIME OF HIRE OR APPOINTMENT TO BOARD OF DIRECTORS; REVIEWED ANNUALLY.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: SALARY DATA COMPILED AND EVALUATED ON YEARLY BASIS BY HR CONSULTANT AND REVIEWED BY EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR WITH OVERSIGHT BY HUMAN RESOURCES COMMITTEE OF BOARD OF DIRECTORS. DATA COMPILED THROUGH SURVEYS CONDUCTED WITH LOCAL NON-PROFIT AGENCIES AND OTHER DOMESTIC AND SEXUAL VIOLENCE AGENCIES IN THE COMMONWEALTH.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 18
Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE SUBMITTED TO THE LOCAL UNITED WAY WEBSITE. DOCUMENTS AND POLICIES ARE AVAILABLE UPON WRITTEN REQUEST TO THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR.
THE OVERSIGHT PROCESS OF THE AUDIT OF FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND SELECTION OF AN INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT HAS NOT CHANGED FROM PRIOR YEARS.
